meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Bosnia and Herzegovina.
meanings.sent1: In Bosnia and Herzegovina, you can buy many things with fenings.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for fenings at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The vending machine only accepted fenings, making it a challenge for tourists.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a handful of fenings.
meanings.sent5: The sound of fenings clinking together was music to his ears.

meanings.definition: Plural form of 'fening', a unit of currency in Bosnia and Herzegovina.
meanings.sent1: She counted her fenings carefully before heading to the market.
meanings.sent2: The street vendor accepted both euros and fenings for the handmade crafts.
meanings.sent3: The children pooled their fenings to buy a gift for their teacher.
meanings.sent4: The fenings jingled in his pocket as he walked down the cobblestone street.
meanings.sent5: The old man's eyes lit up when he saw the bag of fenings left on his doorstep.
